style.css.LOCAL.47344.css
¶ 
/* common styles for all MayDayPAC modules */

/*By default, grid.css, which is part of Twitter Bootstrap, decorates the divs and makes it obvious where the boundaries are.  This code resets borders and background colors to their defaults.*/

.col-md-1,
.col-md-2,
.col-md-3,
.col-md-4,
.col-md-5,
.col-md-6,
.col-md-7,
.col-md-8,
.col-md-9 {
    background-color: transparent;
    border: none;
    padding:0;
    margin:0;
}

.row,
.row-fluid {
    background-color: transparent;
    border: none;
    padding:0;
    margin:0;
}

/*Bootstrapper only reaches 960px, so we need to wrap our rows in yet another div - one that reaches the full width of the page*/

body {
    font-family: 'Lato',  helvetica, arial, 'sans serif';
}

.full-width {
    width: 100%;
}

/* Top menu */

.menu-row {
    background-color: white;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.topmenu {
    font-family: 'Oswald', arial, helvetica, 'sans serif';
    color: white;
    font-size: 15px;
    background-color: #003366;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0;
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    float: right;
}

.topmenu:hover {
    background-color: #006666;
    color: #ffff33;
}

/* Logo row */

.logo-row {
    background-color: white;
    padding-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.subhead {
    /*Setting max height, height, and line-height to 80px vertically centers the text.*/
    text-align: center;
    position: relative;
    top: 30px;
    height: 80px;

    /*There may be a better way.*/
    font-family: "Oswald", arial, helvetica, "sans serif";
    color: #999999;
    font-size: 22px;
}
